recipes.title: Osuga and Spinach
recipes.ingredients: Some Osuga, little spinach, Onions, tomatoes, 250 ml milk, pinch salt
recipes.instructions: 1. Wash the Osuga and spinach then cut.2. Boiled them for 35mins.3.Drain water then fry them using cooking, onions and tomatoes.4. Mix and add milk then salt.5.Cook for extra5mins. Then serve with Ugali

recipes.title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
recipes.ingredients: Cooked chicken, enchilada sauce, corn tortillas, shredded cheese, black beans, diced tomatoes, sour cream, cilantro
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). 2. In a baking dish, layer tortillas, chicken, beans, tomatoes, and sauce. 3. Top with cheese and bake until bubbly. 4. Garnish with sour cream and cilantro.

recipes.title: Fry Omena
recipes.ingredients: 200 g omena, tomatoes, Half onion, Some salt, Green pepper,Cooking oil
recipes.instructions: 1. Wash omena with hot water. And dry aside. 2.Heat enough oil then add omena to fry till golden brown and crunchy. 3. Add onions and green pepper then mix. 4. Add tomatoes and salt. Cook to mix well.

recipes.title: Matumbo
recipes.ingredients: 1 kg matumbo, Cooking oil, big tomatoes, large onions, Garlic, Ginger, Green pepper,Coriander,Salt
recipes.instructions: 1 Wash your matumbo(cows intestines)Before cutting. 2.Put them in a cooking pot.  3.Add enough water and ginger. (ginger softens them). 4. Cover your cooking pot and let them boil. 5. When soft, ensure you drain the remaining water in a bowl. 6.bShallowly fry the cooked matumbo in little oil. 7. When almost brown, add the onions,galic,corriander,green pepper,and salt. 8. Fry until the onions turn golden brown, then add the tomatoes. 9. Allow the tomatoes to soften as you stir. 10. When you get a thick paste from your tomatoes, your matumbo is ready. Serve with hot ugali. 11.vN/B...I always use fresh spices in my cooking.

recipes.title: Escovitch Fish
recipes.ingredients: Whole fish, vinegar, carrots, onions, bell peppers, Scotch bonnet peppers, allspice
recipes.instructions: 1. Fry the fish until golden brown. 2. Make a pickling sauce with vinegar, peppers, and spices. 3. Pour the sauce over the fried fish and vegetables.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.ingredients: Beef tenderloin, mushrooms, onion, garlic, sour cream, beef broth, butter, paprika, egg noodles
recipes.instructions: 1. Sauté beef and onions. 2. Add mushrooms and garlic, cook until tender. 3. Stir in beef broth and sour cream. 4. Serve over cooked egg noodles.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.ingredients: Tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, salt, pepper
recipes.instructions: 1. Slice tomatoes and mozzarella cheese. 2. Arrange on a plate with fresh basil leaves. 3. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil. 4. Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.ingredients: Butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips
recipes.instructions: 1. Cream butter, sugars, and vanilla. 2. Beat in eggs. 3. Combine dry ingredients, gradually add to creamed mixture. 4. Stir in chocolate chips. 5. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets. 6. Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 8-10 minutes or until golden brown.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.ingredients: Assorted vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas, mushrooms), soy sauce, garlic, ginger, vegetable oil, rice
recipes.instructions: 1. Heat oil in a large skillet or wok. 2. Add garlic and ginger, cook until fragrant. 3. Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp. 4. Stir in soy sauce. 5. Serve over cooked rice.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.ingredients: Romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, croutons, Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, olive oil
recipes.instructions: 1. Toss torn lettuce with dressing, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, and olive oil. 2. Top with croutons and shaved Parmesan cheese. 3. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti pasta, bacon or pancetta, eggs, Parmesan cheese, black pepper
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. Sauté bacon until crispy. 3. Whisk eggs and Parmesan cheese. 4. Toss hot pasta with egg mixture and bacon. 5. Season with black pepper.
